channel.title: 思考 on BloxTop
channel.description: Recent content in 思考 on BloxTop

item.title: Lessons learned
item.description: Day trading and lessons learned In order to increase fund utilization, today I tried day trading and felt sucks for my operation. It’s quite different from what I usually do. it’s more vulnerable and having less time to think. Need to enter when chance come and get out when wrong immediately. Yellow line shows where I get in and out. It’s obvious not right to hold so long during day trading and no operation when finding enter the wrong position.
